title: A talk
contents:
Let’s try some of John Helveston’s icon link functions



Two calls to icon_link in the same code chunk puts the buttons on the same line

 materials more materials

Calls to icon_link in the different chunks put them on separate lines

 even more materials


 materials

Here’s three in a row that fit:

 materials materials materials

Here are three in a row that don’t fit (put them on separate lines instead)

 lots materials lots more materials yet more materials
